cab.content: DOCUMENT IS.THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITAHHIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT).4818.WAR CEPIHKT.RESOLUTION PASSED BY THE AGRICULTURAL ADVISORY COMMITTEE TO THE MINISTRY OF FOOD 4 th Juno 1918,"That this Committee is of opinion that the fresh call made Toy the Government for man-power to be di?awn from men from 23 to 31 years of ago, employed in Agriculture is the most fatal policy, that the Pood Production of this Country ie seriously imperilled thereby, and that an extension of time for further consideration of the question ie necessary"o * o a
